column1: 1210|twelve-ten|The child said that it was twelve-ten and that Gonda was already late. Another child said that maybe the rain had delayed him. Another said
column3: his director was taking a plane from Hollywood.

column1: 1210|ten past noon|I stashed my basket of dirty rags and Turtle Wax by the exit door in the arcade. It was ten past noon
column2: but right then food wasn’t what I was hungry for. I walked slowly along the track and into Horror House.
and ten minutes later|Madame Dumas arrived at noon
column3: and ten minutes later Trause handed her his ATM card and instructed her to go to the neighborhood Citibank near Sheridan Square and transfer forty thousand dollars from his savings account to his checking account.

column1: 1210|twelve-ten|They paid for only one room and kept Einstein with them because they were not going to need privacy for lovemaking. Exhausted
column2: Travis barely managed to kiss Nora before falling into a deep sleep. He dreamed of things with yellow eyes
column4: and crocodile mouths full of sharks’ teeth. He woke five hours later
